title: Heel Slides
description: Lie on your back with your knees bent. Slowly slide the heel of your operated leg down until your leg is straight. Then, slide it back up to the starting position.

title: Ankle Pumps
description: Lie on your back and gently point and flex your ankles. This helps to improve circulation in your legs.

title: Pendulum Swings
description: Lean forward and support your good arm on a table. Let your other arm hang down and gently swing it in small circles.

title: Abdominal Bracing
description: Lie on your back with your knees bent. Tighten your abdominal muscles as if you are about to be punched in the stomach. Hold for 5 seconds and then relax.

title: Quad Sets
description: Lie on your back with your leg straight. Tighten the muscle on the top of your thigh by pushing the back of your knee into the floor. Hold for 5 seconds and then relax.

title: Deep Breathing
description: Sit or lie down in a comfortable position. Inhale slowly through your nose, allowing your chest and belly to expand. Exhale slowly through your mouth. This helps to improve lung capacity and promote relaxation.
